description: inputs is non-strategy params, and strategy defined all output variable and Variable generation rule. Built-in metrics include [@open,@close,@high,@low,@total_turnover,@volume] , Built-in variable include [$now] , Build-in statistics functions include [$$avg(timeType,timeStart,timeOffset,@metric), $$sd(timeType,timeStart,timeOffset,@metric),$$max(timeType,timeStart,timeOffset,@metric),$$min(timeType,timeStart,timeOffset,@metric)], Build-in base functions include [ $$fetch(timeType,time,timeOffset,@metric) ].you can use base function and statistics function in strategy
